com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Class ScupThumbnailListBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupWidgetBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupThumbnailListBox

  • public class ScupThumbnailListBox
extends ScupWidgetBase
    This class represents a ScupThumbnailListBox widget.
    This is a kind of extended widget. If a device can not support this widget, a device can display using the base widget instead of this.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  ScupThumbnailListBox.ClickListener
      This listener interface is called when user click ScupThumbnailListBox item.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys a ScupThumbnailListBox instance.
        If the ScupThumbnailListBox is shown on the screen, ScupThumbnailListBox should be hidden automatically.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class ScupWidgetBase
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If widget is already destroyed.
